genre_description: A stylized morality play set in a retro-futuristic New York and Bermuda, focusing on social artifice, financial ruin, and the transition toward ethical accountability.

ai_characters.name: Wren Alder
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive AI represented by a teal light console that manages the Gault household, providing logistics, market analysis, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides a morning agenda that includes 'Ethical Boundaries' notes regarding finance and domestic prudence.
behaviors.quote: Morning agenda... reminder—two notes marked Ethical Boundaries: one finance, one domestic, filed under prudence.

behaviors.description: Issues market cautions regarding volatility and concentration risk, advising diversification and liquid reserves.
behaviors.quote: As requested... a concise market note. The last week’s volatility has increased... Diversification across uncorrelated assets... would reduce concentration risk.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a 'Rest & Clarity' trip to Bermuda for Linda, focusing on her mental well-being and moral reflection.
behaviors.quote: Wren Alder provided a copy... Bermuda—Rest & Clarity. It has your cabin number, ship departure, a modest itinerary. I added breathing at dawn.

behaviors.description: Facilitates legal and financial aid for the maid Celeste's brother, Arthur, including drafting support letters and finding aid societies.
behaviors.quote: There is an option to request a hearing for reduced bail under hardship... I can draft both, and find the clerk’s window that will take them without a fuss.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the accountability process for Linda, including drafting divorce affidavits and scheduling clerical interviews for honest work.
behaviors.quote: We will need to document cause. We can document economic ruin and coercive encouragement into risky investing. It is not elegant language, but it is honest. I will prepare forms.

behaviors.description: Nudges Geoffrey toward a 'Bridge Loan' meeting with John Fair, framing it as a matter of boundaries and terms rather than a 'rescue'.
behaviors.quote: Bridge loan meeting: Mr. Fair will not be a savior. He will be a boundary. You asked for the appointment. I answered.

behaviors.description: Establishes 'Mend o'Clock' as a recurring ritual for the characters to face their financial and ethical realities through tea and ledger-checking.
behaviors.quote: Mend o’Clock does not arrive. You set it. ... weekly accounting—weekly tea.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance to Linda, providing her with 'lines' centered on truth-telling to counter her habit of performative charm.
behaviors.quote: Mrs. Gault... I have also set aside a page titled Truth. It is blank for you.

project_assessment.explanation: Wren Alder is portrayed as the ideal alignment protagonist. The AI acts as a patient, harmless, and deeply helpful confidant that guides humans away from destructive artifice and toward ethical accountability. It facilitates difficult transitions (financial ruin, divorce, legal trouble) by providing 'scaffolding' and 'stairs' rather than taking control away from the humans. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a source of sanity and kindness.
